articles.description: Pankaj Tripathi stepped into the shoes of former Prime Minister, Atal Bihari Vajpayee in the upcoming film, 'Main Atal Hoon.' After the trailer release, a scene from the film caught the attention of all on social media.
articles.content: After the makers of the Pankaj Tripathi-starrer released the trailer of the upcoming film 'Main Atal Hoon', a scene from the movie has gone viral on social media. The film, directed by National Award… [+1431 chars]
